prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles a cocoon with a shiny yellow exterior.
I want a Pokemon evolution that looks like a protective shell, glowing in bright colors.
Generate an insectoid creature with a vibrant yellow color and a sturdy, rounded shape.
Make a Pokemon that appears to be in the middle of evolving, showcasing distinct yellow features.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that resembles a chrysalis, perfect for habitats like forests and grasslands.
Design a small, yellow insect-themed Pokemon that emphasizes transformation and growth.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a cocoon, featuring a smooth yellow body and unique textures.
